sqlinfo.sqlname: 查询仓库物资入库数量信息
sqlinfo.sql: SELECT p1.param_name putin_storehouse_name, t1.jy_material_id, sum(t1.putin_number) putin_number, t2.`code` material_code, t2.`name` material_name, t2.model, t2.supplier, t3.`code` material_type_code, t3.`name` material_type_name FROM jy_storehouse_in t0 LEFT JOIN jy_storehouse_in_detail t1 ON t0.id = t1.jy_storehouse_in_id LEFT JOIN jy_material t2 ON t1.jy_material_id = t2.id LEFT JOIN jy_material_type t3 ON t2.jy_material_type_id = t3.id LEFT JOIN jy_params p1 ON t0.putin_storehouse_code = p1.param_code WHERE t0.putin_storehouse_code = $S{storehouse_code} AND ( $ISNULL{material_id} OR t1.jy_material_id = $N{material_id} ) AND t0.`status` = 2 ORDER BY t1.jy_material_id;

查询物资仓储预警信息
sqlinfo.sql: SELECT t1.id, t1.warn_storehouse_code, p1.param_name warn_storehouse_name, t1.jy_material_id, t1.warn_number, t1.inputuser, t1.remark, t1.crt_date, t2.`code` material_code, t2.`name` material_name, t2.model, t2.supplier, t3.`code` material_type_code, t3.`name` material_type_name FROM jy_material_warn t1 LEFT JOIN jy_material t2 ON t1.jy_material_id = t2.id LEFT JOIN jy_material_type t3 ON t2.jy_material_type_id = t3.id LEFT JOIN jy_params p1 ON t1.warn_storehouse_code = p1.param_code WHERE ( t1.inputuser = $N{sys_user_id} ) AND ( $ISNULL{id} OR t1.id = $N{id} ) AND ( $ISNULL{warn_storehouse_code} OR t1.warn_storehouse_code = $S{warn_storehouse_code} ) AND ( $ISNULL{jy_material_id} OR t1.jy_material_id = $N{jy_material_id} )

sqlinfo.sqlname: 新增物资仓储预警信息
sqlinfo.sql: INSERT INTO jy_material_warn ( jy_material_id, warn_storehouse_code, warn_number, remark, inputuser, crt_date, crt_time ) VALUES ( $S{jy_material_id}, $S{warn_storehouse_code}, $N{warn_number}, $S{remark}, $N{sys_user_id}, $S{SYSDATE}, $S{SYSTIME} );
